content: 10 holes between them place them above the stitch markers look to pictures on pg 4 for reference if you want the sunken eye look do not place the backs of the eyes on until round 15 11-12 single_crochet in each st around 13 6 single_crochet decrease x 3 12 single_crochet decrease x 3 18 single_crochet= 42 14 single_crochet decrease x 14= 28 15 5 single_crochet decrease x 4= 24 place the eyelashes on the back of the eyes before placing the eyes now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and insert the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it 16 single_crochet in each st around 17 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 f/o sweet oddity art 3 sweet oddity art 4 arms make 2 ears make 2 starting with color b with color a 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 2 single_crochet increase x 3= 9 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 3 2 single_crochet increase x 3= 12 4 blo single_crochet in each st around 4 3 single_crochet increase x 3= 15 5 single_crochet in each st around 5 single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 do not stuff the ears change to color a 6 3 single_crochet decrease x 3= 12 7-8 single_crochet in each st around 7 single_crochet in each st around start stuffing the arms 8 decrease x 6= 6 9 2 single_crochet decrease x 3= 9 fold the ears in half and single_crochet the opening stop stuffing the arms closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing 10-12 single_crochet in each st around 13 decrease 7 single_crochet= 8 14 single_crochet in each st around fold the arms in half and single_crochet the opening closed f/o and leave a long tail for sewing muzzle horn with color a with color c 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 1 make 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 4 2 increase in each st around= 12 2 single_crochet in each st around 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 3 single_crochet increase x 2= 6 4 2 single_crochet increase x 2 bob single_crochet increase single_crochet bob increase 4 single_crochet in each st around 2 single_crochet increase x 2= 24 stuff the
